sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Button, Container, Navbar } from "react-bootstrap";
import { useSelector } from "react-redux/es/hooks/useSelector";


const ShopNavBar = () => {
    const userRole = useSelector(state => state.user.role)
    return ( 
        <Navbar
            className='p-2'
            bg="dark"
            data-bs-theme="dark"
        >
            <Navbar.Brand>
                Магазин
            </Navbar.Brand>
            <Container
                className="d-flex"
            >
                {userRole === 'admin' ?
                    <Button
                        variant="outline-light"
                    >
                        Добавить товар
                    </Button>
                    :
                    <Container
                        className="d-flex"
                    >
                        <Button
                            className="mr-3"
                            variant="outline-light"
                        >
                            Составить накладную
                        </Button>
                        <Button
                            variant="outline-light"
                        >
                            Прием товаров
                        </Button>
                    </Container>
                    
                }
                <Button
                    variant="outline-light"
                >
                    Выйти
                </Button>
            </Container>
        </Navbar>
     );
}
 
export default ShopNavBar;
